about_the_game:
Lured is a 3-player cooperative puzzle-adventure game in the first-person.

Please note this game requires 3 players and the ability to communicate with a PC-compatible microphone.

Lured is set in an ancient Mayan temple deep in the heart of South America. Players take on the role of three brave explorers who must navigate the temple's treacherous caves and ancient tombs to solve a series of challenging puzzles to uncover its secrets.

As explorers you will make your way through the temple, encountering all sorts of obstacles and traps, from rolling stone balls and hidden spikes to collapsing floors and more. They must use their wits and quick reflexes to avoid these dangers and progress through the temple.

But the real challenge comes in the form of the temple's puzzles. These ancient mechanisms are cunningly designed to test the adventure's logic, communication and problem-solving skills. Players must carefully examine their surroundings, decipher hieroglyphics manipulate objects and most importantly work together to unlock the temple's hidden secrets.

The fate of the explorers is in your hands!

Lured features:
  • Team of 3: Grab your best buddies for an epic joint adventure, or if you're feeling daring, team up with random players from around the globe. By the end of this thrilling journey, you'll not only be a puzzle master but also gain two more friends!

  • Challenging Puzzles: Get ready to face a temple packed with treacherous traps, brain-bending puzzles, and the joy of explaining bizarre symbols to your bewildered buddies.

  • Asymmetrical Gameplay: Brace yourself for those moments when you and your pals end up separate on opposite ends of the puzzle spectrum. Keep calm, and crack some jokes over the communication lines, until you navigate your way back to each other.

  • Ancient Mystery: Dark secrets are hidden within...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750TI or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4000 series or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone
